CustomField.description: Returns ACV only for OPEN deals (not closed) with Target Sign Date in Q1 2026. Use alongside Q1 2026 Closed Won ACV for clean separation without double-counting.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(IsClosed), Target_LOI_Date__c >= DATE(2026, 2, 1), Target_LOI_Date__c <= DATE(2026, 4, 30) ), ACV__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Q1 2026 Open Pipeline ACV
